connector.description: Forward data to a GraphQL endpoint.

camel.kamelet.graphql-sink.url.name: camel.kamelet.graphql-sink.url
camel.kamelet.graphql-sink.url.description: The URL to which you want to send data. Example: http://example.com/graphql

camel.kamelet.graphql-sink.accessToken.name: camel.kamelet.graphql-sink.accessToken
camel.kamelet.graphql-sink.accessToken.description: The access Token to use to access GraphQL server
